title: Immortal Emperor Returns - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Reincarnation
author: 布凡
description: His left hand's medical skills were astonishing, his right hand's martial arts were extraordinary, and he had failed his tribulation. The number one immortal emperor of the Nine Layered Heavens, Lin Feng, had returned to being a young man once again. Facing a wife with no real name, a mother who had to endure humiliation...>
